participant_2.background:
I like fantasizing.
I like getting packages in the mail.
I love christmas.
I have a daughter.
I wish magic was real.

content.text: I like fantasizing about what my life would be like if magic was real.
That's a fun hobby! I like to do that too.
What's your favorite thing to fantasize about?
I like to fantasize about being able to fly. It would be so much fun to be able to see the world from a bird's eye view.
That would be amazing! I would love to be able to fly too.
What else do you like to fantasize about?
I also like to fantasize about being able to control the weather. It would be so cool to be able to make it rain or snow whenever I wanted.
That would be awesome! I could use that power to help people in need.
Me too! I would love to be able to use my powers to make the world a better place.
I think you would be a great superhero.
Thanks! I think I would be pretty good at it too.
Well, I'm sure you would. You seem like a very kind and compassionate person.
Thank you. I try to be.
I'm glad. The world needs more people like you.
Thanks. I'm glad to be here.
